history.content:
As a group of students who understand the struggles of online school, we created a platform for students to collaborate and connect with other UC Berkeley students and alumni through academic opportunities like study sessions, mentoring, and class group chats. It's is specifically designed for Berkeley students who want a space to find opportunities to work with other Berkeley students. We just launched and have 70 users currently. We hope this platform can help you ease your way into another online semester. You can visit our platform, Collayt, at https://www.collayt.com/ 
Feel free to reach out to us at collaytteam@gmail.com or visit us on Instagram: @collaytteam
history.subject: Academic Opportunities Platform
